networkMap.description: Mapping of source networks to destination networks.

destinationName.description: Name of the destination network (required if type is `multus`).

destinationType.description: Destination type: `pod` for pod network, or `multus` for a Multus network.

sourceId.description: The managed object reference ID of the source network in vSphere.

sourceSecretName.description: Name of the Kubernetes Secret containing VMware credentials (`user`, `password`, `thumbprint` keys).

sourceUrl.description: URL of the VMware vCenter server (e.g. `https://vcenter.example.com/sdk`).

storageMap.description: Mapping of source datastores to destination StorageClasses.

sourceId.description: The managed object reference ID of the source datastore in vSphere.

storageClass.description: Name of the destination Kubernetes StorageClass.

vms.description: List of virtual machines to migrate.

id.description: The managed object reference ID of the VM in vSphere (e.g. `vm-123`).

name.description: Optional target name for the VM in KubeVirt.

warm.description: Enable warm migration (incremental replication before cutover).
